name: Woodshop Madness
description:
Welcome to the woodshop! Before you do anything please read the rules carefully:

1) Wear safety equipment at all times

2) Treat the tools with respect

3) Return tools to their proper spots on the tool wall

and most importantly...

4) DO NOT CLIMB THE TOOL WALL

Mobile controls: tap on the left and right sides of the screen to move left/right

PC controls: press a/d or the arrow keys to move left/right
